column3: I think you need to update `makefile.am` so that these are installed (and part of the tarball)?
Move the script to a different commit?
Closing this for now - let me know if you start work on this again (there are some unresolved comments) and I'll reopen.
Could add [up for grabs](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues?q=label%3A%22Up+for+grabs%22) tag in case someone wants to resume work.
